metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8001 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In PoDoFo 0.9.5, there exists a heap-based buffer over-read vulnerability in UnescapeName() in PdfName.cpp. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service or possibly unspecified other impact via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.6+dfsg-3').
